Metadata: "Effects of different fishery management schemes on bycatch, joint catch, and discards."
Summary of a national workshop, San Francisco, California, January 29-31, 1990.

The goals of this workshop and publication are to stimulate multidisciplina​ry research, discussion, and innovative fishery management techniques directed at lessening fishery bycatch and discard problems. Panel presentations and discussions focused on likely bycatch and discard problem consequences under six primary management schemes: unregulated, seasons, quotas, mesh restrictions, limited entry, and individual transferable quotas. Discard probems under each management scheme and recommended research needs and ideas for lessening bycatch problems were discussed.
